sourcesContent: import { Navigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const ContactForm = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({}); const datahandle = (e) => { setUser({ ...user, [e.target.id]: e.target.value }); console.log(user); }; const submithandle = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log(event); const data = await axios.post( "https://itgiants.onrender.com/api/v1/contact", user ); alert(data.message); ; }; return (
